page.title: Fraun Biomed - Company Profile
page.description: Fraun Biomed focuses on high-end microscopic imaging and is the exclusive distributor of SCANCO MEDICAL AG in Greater China.

about.title: Company Profile
about.p1: Founded in 2014, Fraun Biomed has been dedicated to high-end microscopic imaging. As the exclusive distributor of SCANCO MEDICAL AG in Greater China (including Mainland China, Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan), we have built a complete service system spanning basic research to clinical translation, with more than 70 systems installed and a sustained leading market share.
about.p2: Leveraging a service framework that connects universities, research institutes, and medical institutions, we created China’s first one-stop precision 3D imaging platform for SCANCO Micro CT, covering:
list: End-to-end technical support: from model selection and installation/commissioning to application training
Customized scanning & testing: micron- and sub-micron-level ultra-high-resolution imaging solutions
Full life-cycle management: 24/7 rapid-response maintenance service
about.footer: Looking ahead, Fraun Biomed will continue to fulfill its mission of “innovation powered by microscopic imaging,” develop joint-lab collaboration models, deepen partnerships with leading public and private institutions and universities, and strive to become a foundational leader in microscopic imaging infrastructure.

values.title: Core Values
values.text: Master the micro, go beyond the micro — every micron of imaging drives cross-dimensional innovation.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To become a foundational leader in microscopic imaging infrastructure
